title: AI-DLC Settings
description: Configuration schema for .ai-dlc/settings.yml files that configure AI-DLC behavior including VCS strategy

providers.description: External system providers for spec, ticketing, design, and comms

ticketingProvider.description: Ticketing/issue tracking provider (Jira, Linear, GitHub Issues, GitLab Issues)

config.description: Provider-specific configuration (project keys, workspace IDs, etc.)

change_strategy.description:
How changes are organized:
- trunk: All work on main branch, no feature branches
- unit: One branch per unit of work (default)
- bolt: One branch per intent with squashed commits
- intent: One long-lived branch per intent with linear history

elaboration_review.description: Whether to create a pull request for elaborated intent review before planning

default_branch.description: The default/main branch name. Set to 'auto' to detect from remote (origin/HEAD), or specify explicitly (e.g., 'main', 'master', 'develop')

auto_merge.description: Whether to automatically merge completed unit branches. Only applies to 'unit' and 'bolt' strategies.

auto_squash.description: Whether to squash commits when merging. Only applies when auto_merge is enabled.
